response.overview: After an accident, acclaimed novelist Paul Sheldon is rescued by a nurse who claims to be his biggest fan.  Her obsession takes a dark turn when she holds him captive in her remote Colorado home and forces him to write back to life the popular literary character he killed off.
response.tagline: Paul Sheldon used to write for a living. Now, he’s writing to stay alive.
response.title: Misery
